cardio.details: Threshold 5k; sustained effort near threshold pace, primary weekly speed stimulus

other.details: Open class; felt strong, jumps good, turns slippery; left hip irritation noted

fitness_weeks.summary: Strong glute emphasis with minimal upper-body spillover. Aerobic support maintained despite illness. Ballet aligned with aesthetic goals but highlighted left hip sensitivity.

cardio.details: Lunch run 2.45 mi, 24:33 (10:00/mi), flat; avg HR 152, steady moderate effort
6-mile hike, ~2000 ft gain, snowy; long steady effort, high time-on-feet with low impact

fitness_weeks.summary: High overall volume with a demanding hike, two aerobic runs, and well-controlled glute work (one hard, one easy, one outlier). Quality run achieved without overreaching. Stopping here appropriate given cumulative load.
